title: Pause/resume
text: You can pause and resume the simulation at any time using this button. The simulation pauses automatically when you open any sub-window, such as meal selection, insulin pump and others.

title: Meals
text: By clicking on this button, you open the meal selection window. Select the meal you want to eat and the results will show immediatelly

title: Insulin pump
text: This button opens the insulin pump interface. You can view the pump display, and also control the physical aspects, such as charging the battery or changing the insulin reservoir.

title: Exercise
text: You can also do some exercise to stay fit. This button opens a window with exercise selection by intensity, with the option to set duration.
